feedback: Fix FAQ accessibility: ensure each question button has aria-expanded (true/false) and aria-controls linking to a panel with a unique id; panels should have role="region" and aria-labelledby. Update js/scripts.js to toggle aria-expanded and classNames, and ensure Enter and Space keys toggle the panels (keydown handler).

Keyboard & focus: add visible focus styles (use :focus-visible) for all interactive elements (links, buttons, form controls). Ensure the 'Skip to content' link is first in DOM, becomes visible on focus, and points to <main id="main">.

Form validation: add required attributes to name, email (type="email"), and message fields. Use small JS enhancements (setCustomValidity / reportValidity or inline error text) but still rely on HTML5 validation. Prevent actual navigation on demo submit and show a friendly success state.

Smooth scroll / reduced motion: only use smooth scroll when prefers-reduced-motion is not set. In js/scripts.js, guard scrollIntoView({ behavior: 'smooth' }) with a media query check and fallback to instant scroll.

Sticky nav / layout stability: ensure nav uses position: sticky; top: 0; with an explicit height and z-index. Reserve nav height in layout (e.g., body padding-top or main margin-top equal to nav height) to avoid content jump/CLS on load.

Dark mode & contrast: verify color tokens in css/styles.css provide >=4.5:1 contrast for body text in both light and dark themes. Avoid hard-coded colors; use variables switched under @media (prefers-color-scheme).

Accordion ARIA testing: ensure tab order is natural and that screen readers announce state changes. Add unit-like checks in QA (or manual steps) to confirm aria-expanded toggles and panels are reachable via Tab.

Remove or fix empty/duplicate anchors: there is an empty #top link and multiple duplicate nav links—clean up nav markup so each link is unique and labeled, and remove empty anchors to improve accessibility and avoid unexpected focus targets.
Images/SVG sizing: ensure all illustrative SVGs/images include explicit width/height or aspect-ratio rules so space is reserved and CLS is prevented. Verify icon SVGs have width/height attributes.

Scripts & performance: load js/scripts.js with defer (or place at end of body) and avoid blocking. Remove any large unused JS; minimize console warnings/errors. Confirm no console errors in latest Chrome/Firefox/Safari/Edge.
Content & metadata: ensure the string 'LoopPilot' appears in the <title>, visible H1, and meta description (exact capitalization) to satisfy automated checks that looked for the task keyword.

Documentation: update README.md to mention how to preview the page (open index.html), list design tokens (colors, breakpoints), note that prefers-reduced-motion is respected, and call out any known limitations or browser caveats.

headings.text: Close the loop with LoopPilot. Ship what matters.

buttons.text: How does the free trial work?
Do you support SSO and role permissions?
Do you offer discounts for nonprofits?
